meanings.sent1: She is the whiniest child in the class.
meanings.sent2: The whiniest puppy always wants attention.
meanings.sent3: Even the whiniest cat couldn't resist a cozy blanket.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the whiniest bird filled the forest.
meanings.sent5: His whiniest voice echoed through the room.

meanings.sent1: The whiniest student never seems satisfied.
meanings.sent2: Her whiniest friend always finds something to complain about.
meanings.sent3: The whiniest customer demanded to speak to the manager.
meanings.sent4: The whiniest car alarm kept going off in the night.
meanings.sent5: His whiniest tone grated on everyone's nerves.

meanings.definition: having a tendency to whine or complain
meanings.sent1: The whiniest toddler always wants more toys.
meanings.sent2: Their whiniest colleague never seems happy with their work.
meanings.sent3: The whiniest sibling always gets their way with a pout.
meanings.sent4: The whiniest engine noise signaled a problem with the car.
meanings.sent5: Her whiniest expression made it clear she was not pleased.
